member.name: M:Rhetos.DatabaseGenerator.IConceptDatabaseDefinitionExtension.ExtendDatabaseStructure(Rhetos.Dsl.IConceptInfo,Rhetos.Compiler.ICodeBuilder,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Tuple{Rhetos.Dsl.IConceptInfo,Rhetos.Dsl.IConceptInfo}}@)
member.summary: Used to modify "create queries" that are produced by other concept implementations.
member.param: Concept instance for which database structure needs to be created.
Use tags to insert new code in extension points that are provided by other concept implementations.

Provide new dependencies if inserted code have created additional dependencies that are not obvious from ConceptInfo dependencies or from DepenedsOn metadata. In the Tuple, Item2 depends on Item1. If no additional dependencies are created, set the output value to null. In createdDependencies you can create and use a new instance of concept info to reference existing concept info with same concept info key.
